name: Anto: The Little Wizard Adventures
description:
Hello player!

I present you my creation and I hope you like this game.

It's a simple game with a cute character named Anto.

His dream is to become a great wizard, but to get there he has to go through some beautiful adventures.

More about the story and player controls is presented in the game!

IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT !

Unfortunately, this is only a small part of the presentation of the game!

The game contains 10 levels + a few surprise levels + BOSS FIGHT !

The full game is only available on GooglePlay and AmazonApp Store!

The game was designed for the mobile platform!

Download with confidence and I look forward to as many feedback as possible!

I wish you a beautiful and ... short adventure!
